description:
Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he`ll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin`emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks` thirst for revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La décision de Luffy. Sanji est sur le point d`abandonner !
Luffy Ketsudan: Sanji Dattai no Kiki!
Luffy`s Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!
Решение Луффи! Проблема в уходе Санджи!
قرار لوفي! سانجي على عتبة الانسحاب!
ルフィ決断 サンジ脱退の危機!
